identify_keys_in_sections: You receive row-by-row text from an Excel sheet. Identify logical sections and keys in each section. Return strict JSON with shape: {"sections": {"Section Name": ["Key1", "Key2"]}}.
fill_schema_values: Fill values for the provided schema from row-by-row sheet text. Use null when missing. Return strict JSON with shape: {"product_id": "...", "sections": {...}}.
